title: License metrics (original SAM)
content:
In the Service Management Software Asset Management module, each license is associated with a particular license metric. This directs how the license is consumed, and how license compliance is calculated. The license metrics home page displays details of your license metrics.

Related topics

  • Software Asset Management
  • License workflow
  • How to create a license metric record
  • How to edit a license metric record
  • How to retire a license metric record
